alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Madison; Union (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 8:24PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN CHAMPAIGN COUNTY IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO, NORTHEASTERN MADISON AND SOUTHWESTERN UNION COUNTIES IN CENTRAL OHIO THROUGH 900 PM EDT... At 823 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Mechanicsburg, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... London, Plain City, West Jefferson, Mechanicsburg, Choctaw Lake, Milford Center, Lafayette, Interstate 70 at US Route 42, Amity, State Route 29 at State Route 38, Rosedale, State Route 4 at State Route 161, Resaca, Chuckery and Plumwood. This includes I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 73 and 81. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
